subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike Dunleavy scored 21 points, Joakim Noah flirted with a triple-double, and the Chicago Bulls posted a 111-87 victory at home over the Houston Rockets.
snippet: Mike Dunleavy scored 21 points, Joakim Noah flirted with a triple-double, and the Chicago Bulls posted a 111-87 victory at home over the Houston Rockets.
